content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, thank you for your interest in the apartment. The monthly rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. Please let me know what you are willing to pay.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month. Is that acceptable?

When I was looking for apartments, I was looking for the cheapest one possible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible. I am a student. I am from the United States of America.

Please let me know if there are any other conditions that I need to be aware of before I agree to the rental price. Thank you.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mary Smith. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 1000 Euros per month, I must say that the market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in New York is higher. However, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

As a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. Therefore, I would like to propose a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. This is based on the current market rate and the condition of the apartment.

I appreciate your dependability and responsibility as a student, and I am willing to work with you to make this arrangement work. If you agree to the rental price of 1200 Euros per month, I will sign the lease agreement with you.

If you have any other questions or concerns, please let me know. Thank you for your interest in the apartment.

content:
Thank you for your response, Mary Smith. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and accept the rental price of 1200 Euros per month.

As a landlord, I want to ensure that the apartment is well-maintained and that you are a responsible tenant. Therefore, I would like to add a few conditions to the lease agreement.

Firstly, I would like you to sign a security deposit agreement that covers any potential damages to the apartment. The security deposit will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled your responsibilities as a tenant.

Secondly, I would like you to pay for all utility bills, including electricity, water, and gas, separately from the rental price. You will be responsible for paying these bills on time and in full.

Lastly, I would like you to be mindful of noise levels and maintain a reasonable level of quietness during quiet hours.

I hope these conditions are acceptable to you. If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know. Thank you for your interest in the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
